spanGrp.span: We speak at home Urum language that we learned by ourselves.
bän ävdä söilirım urumja angısıni ki biz bülirıh biz gändımız
1.SG house -LOC speak -AOR -1.SG Urum which -ACC that 1.PL know -AOR -1.PL 1.PL own -POSS.1.PL
These villagers, our people speak Urum.
bu kövlülär bizım halh ambu tsalkanın urumlari
this villager -PL 1.PL -GEN people this Tsalka -GEN Urum -POSS.3PL
We will need this language to talk between us.
bu dil bizä lazım olir bizım ičımızda
We speak Russian as because we can use it in any documents and communication.
biz söilirıh urus dilıni angisi ki ärbir dakument išındä käğıt išındä i özgä halhınan ğonušmadan ötüri
1.PL speak -AOR -1.PL Russian language -POSS.3 -ACC who -ACC that everything document:SG.M.NOM thing -POSS.3 -LOC paper thing -POSS.3 -LOC and other people -INSTR speak -INF -ABL for
Our language is considered as Russian as we write and know it.
bizdän bizım sailir urus dili angısıniki yazıp_jızerıh bülirıh o dildän
1.PL -ABL 1.PL -GEN consider -AOR Russian language -POSS.3 which -ACC -COMP write and know -IPFV -1.PL know -AOR -1.PL that language -ABL
We don’t know how to write in this language, we only know how to speak.
biz bu dildän yazıp_jızmah bülmirıh biz bu dildän bir söilämäi bülirıh
1.PL this language -ABL write and know -INF know -NEG -AOR -1.PL 1.PL this language -ABL one speak -INF -ACC know -AOR -1.PL
This is between us to speak.
bu biz bizım aramızda söilämäya ğanirıh
It’s not bad to know languages though we consider this language as it’s our enemy’s language.
dil bülmäh o köti iš dägıl khatya biz bu dili sairıh bizım düšmänın dili
language know -INF that bad thing NOM.NEG though 1.PL this language -ACC consider -AOR -1.PL 1.PL -GEN enemy -GEN language -POSS.3
You always need to know your enemy’s language.
But the language is not the enemy.
